description: This app supports various identity management actions on Okta
name: Okta

actions.description: Validate the asset configuration for connectivity using supplied configuration
Validate the user prompt with push notification
actions.verbose:
The action has not yet been implemented for the "sms" and the "token:software:totp" factortypes.
Currently, the action would generate a new OTP for the "sms" factortype and will not verify it.
The action would fail for the "token:software:totp" factortype as it has not yet been implemented.

email.description: Okta User id, email address, or username

filter.description: Filters users with a supported expression for a subset of properties

query.description: Find a user that matches firstName, lastName, and email properties

search.description: Searches for users with a supported filtering expression for most properties

limit.description: Specifies the number of results returned

example_values: What is the food you least liked as a child?

actions.verbose:
Limit parameter is used to provide total number of users to be fetched. Please provide a valid positive integer value for limit. Use the query parameter for a simple lookup of users by name, for example when creating a people picker. The value of query is matched against firstName, lastName, or email.
Use the filter parameter to filter on the following properties:
  • status
  • lastUpdated
  • id
  • profile.login
  • profile.email
  • profile.firstName
  • profile.lastName

Use the search parameter to do a case-insensitive search on the following properties:

  • id
  • status
  • created
  • activated
  • statusChanged
  • lastUpdated

Filter and search operators:

  • eq: equal
  • sw: starts with
  • pr: present (has value)
  • gt: greater than
  • ge: greater than or equal
  • lt: less than
  • le: less than or equal

Filter and search examples:

  • status eq "STAGED"
  • lastUpdated lt "yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm:ss.SSSZ"
  • lastUpdated gt "yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm:ss.SSSZ"

Limit parameter is used to provide total number of identity providers to be fetched from your organization. Please provide a valid positive integer value for limit. Use the query parameter for a simple lookup of users by name, for example when creating a people picker. The value of query is matched against firstName, lastName, or email.
Use the filter parameter to filter on the following properties:
